title: These Beats Studio Pro are better than AirPods Max and half off today
content:
Macworld

The Beats Studio Pro may very well be our favorite headphones, especially as we find them better than the AirPods Max and a lot more affordable. But today’s price makes them a downright steal—the Beats Studio Pro are on sale for $180 at Amazon, making it the perfect time to get your very own pair.

Delivering a fantastic audio performance and a comfortable design, the Studio Pro are usually available for $350, so you’ll end up saving quite a bit of money. Our review of the Beats Studio Pro concluded with a 4.5/5 star rating and our Editors’ Choice award and praised the headphones for how lightweight they are with clean and balanced audio: “The new Beats Studio Pro may not be made of aluminum and steel with a fancy mesh headband, but they cost $200 less and deliver better sound, broader compatibility, and most of the important AirPods features. Oh, and they come with a real carrying case.”

Beats delivers rich sound and you’ll get it whether you’re listening to music or chatting with friends. You can even tailor the sound to your preference with three built-in sound profiles if you want to.

There are also two distinct listening modes: fully-adaptive Active Noise Cancelling and Transparency mode. The first one lets you block out external noise, while the latter allows you to stay aware of your surroundings when needed, which is essential when walking down the street for instance.

So go ahead and snag the Beats Studio Pro headphones while they’re still $180 at Amazon. You won’t be sorry you chose this model.
